details.description:
The Baltic Canal ? Modern Living in Boerum Hill
Studios, 1-; 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio; panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus; Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops; F/G/R trains.
📅 Schedule your tour today and make The Baltic Canal your next home.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description:
Modern 2br/1bth at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 2 bed features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Modern 2 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

Nestled right between BedStuy and Crown Heights, this location offers the amazing old school vibe of Brooklyn AND the new luxury of of one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of Atlantic Avenue around the corner and Franklin Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby.
Conveniently off the A,C and LIRR trains as well as the B25, B43, and B44 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher and Microwave Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability)

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

? One Fifty Lawrence ? Elevated Living in the Heart of Downtown Brooklyn
Welcome to One Fifty Lawrence, a modern 25-story tower redefining Brooklyn living. Nestled between Fulton and Willoughby Streets, this striking new residence blends refined design, thoughtful amenities, and unbeatable convenience ? just steps from the Jay St?MetroTech subway hub.
Inside, discover bright studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments with expansive windows, high ceilings, and sleek finishes. Each home is crafted for comfort and style, featuring top-of-the-line appliances, in-unit laundry, and energy-efficient systems.
Residents enjoy access to an impressive amenity collection: a state-of-the-art fitness center, rooftop terrace with sweeping skyline views, resident lounge, and co-working spaces ? all within a pet-friendly community.
At One Fifty Lawrence, you?re surrounded by everything Downtown Brooklyn offers ? premier shopping, dining, and cultural destinations ? while being minutes from Manhattan and the rest of the borough.
Modern design. Urban energy. Unmatched convenience. This is One Fifty Lawrence.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description: Check out this stunning, newly renovated duplex featuring 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms, and an expansive open basement. The space boasts hardwood floors, on-site laundry, and access to a shared backyard. Conveniently located near a variety of restaurants, bars, shops, and grocery stores, and just a short distance from the Morgan Ave and Jefferson St L train stops!

Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description:
Step into this massive 2-bedroom, 2-full-bathroom charmer, boasting exposed brick walls and stunning woodwork throughout!
Features:
- Expansive bedrooms, each fitting a queen-size bed and additional furniture with ease - 2 full bathrooms, providing ample space and convenience - Charming exposed brick walls and beautiful woodwork on walls and ceiling - Additional 2 rooms in the upstairs, perfect for: ? Home offices ? Living spaces ? Creative studios
- Prime location, just 1 block from the J-M-Z train lines - Bordering East Williamsburg and Bushwick, with Bushwick Avenue just 2 blocks away - Endless shopping, dining, and entertainment options at your doorstep
This incredible property offers unparalleled space, character, and convenience. Perfect for roommates, or entrepreneurs seeking a unique living experience. Schedule a viewing today and make it yours!
